verses.verse: My breath <S%H7307><s%> is corrupt <S%H2254><s%>, my days <S%H3117><s%> are extinct <S%H2193><s%>, the graves <S%H6913><s%> are ready for me. breath: or, spirit is spent
Are there not mockers <S%H2049><s%> with me? and doth not mine eye <S%H5869><s%> continue <S%H3885><s%> in their provocation <S%H4784><s%>? continue: Heb. lodge
Lay down <S%H7760><s%> now, put me in a surety <S%H6148><s%> with thee; who is he that will strike <S%H8628><s%> hands <S%H3027><s%> with me?
For thou hast hid <S%H6845><s%> their heart <S%H3820><s%> from understanding <S%H7922><s%>: therefore shalt thou not exalt <S%H7311><s%> them.
He that speaketh <S%H5046><s%> flattery <S%H2506><s%> to his friends <S%H7453><s%>, even the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of his children <S%H1121><s%> shall fail <S%H3615><s%>.
He hath made <S%H3322><s%> me also a byword <S%H4914><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%>; and aforetime <S%H6440><s%> I was as a tabret <S%H8611><s%>. aforetime: or, before them
Mine eye <S%H5869><s%> also is dim <S%H3543><s%> by reason of sorrow <S%H3708><s%>, and all my members <S%H3338><s%> are as a shadow <S%H6738><s%>. my members: or, my thoughts
Upright <S%H3477><s%> men shall be astonied <S%H8074><s%> at this, and the innocent <S%H5355><s%> shall stir up <S%H5782><s%> himself against the hypocrite <S%H2611><s%>.

The righteous <S%H6662><s%> also shall hold <S%H270><s%> on his way <S%H1870><s%>, and he that hath clean <S%H2890><s%> hands <S%H3027><s%> shall be <S%H3254><s%> stronger and stronger <S%H555><s%>. be: Heb. add strength
But <S%H199><s%> as for you all, do ye return <S%H7725><s%>, and come now <S%H935><s%>: for I cannot find <S%H4672><s%> one wise <S%H2450><s%> man among you.
My days <S%H3117><s%> are past <S%H5674><s%>, my purposes <S%H2154><s%> are broken off <S%H5423><s%>, even the thoughts <S%H4180><s%> of my heart <S%H3824><s%>. the thoughts: Heb. the possessions
They change <S%H7760><s%> the night <S%H3915><s%> into day <S%H3117><s%>: the light <S%H216><s%> is short <S%H7138><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of darkness <S%H2822><s%>. short: Heb. near
If I wait <S%H6960><s%>, the grave <S%H7585><s%> is mine house <S%H1004><s%>: I have made <S%H7502><s%> my bed <S%H3326><s%> in the darkness <S%H2822><s%>.

I have said <S%H7121><s%> to corruption <S%H7845><s%>, Thou art my father <S%H1><s%>: to the worm <S%H7415><s%>, Thou art my mother <S%H517><s%>, and my sister <S%H269><s%>. said: Heb. cried, or, called
And where is now <S%H645><s%> my hope <S%H8615><s%>? as for my hope <S%H8615><s%>, who shall see <S%H7789><s%> it?
They shall go down <S%H3381><s%> to the bars <S%H905><s%> of the pit <S%H7585><s%>, when our rest <S%H5183><s%> together <S%H3162><s%> is in the dust <S%H6083><s%>.
